raw: וְאֶל־הַזְּקֵנִים אָמַר שְׁבוּ־לָנוּ בָזֶה עַד אֲשֶׁר־נָשׁוּב אֲלֵיכֶם וְהִנֵּה אַהֲרֹן וְחוּר עִמָּכֶם מִי־בַעַל דְּבָרִים יִגַּשׁ אֲלֵהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And to the elders he said, "Stay here for us until we return to you. Behold, Aaron and Hur are with you. Whoever has a matter, let him approach them."

raw: וַיַּעַל מֹשֶׁה אֶל־הָהָר וַיְכַס הֶעָנָן אֶת־הָהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses went up to the mountain, and the cloud covered the mountain.

raw: וַיִּשְׁכֹּן כְּבוֹד־יְהוָה עַל־הַר סִינַי וַיְכַסֵּהוּ הֶעָנָן שֵׁשֶׁת יָמִים וַיִּקְרָא אֶל־מֹשֶׁה בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי מִתּוֹךְ הֶעָנָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the glory of the Lord dwelt on Mount Sinai, and the cloud covered it for six days. And He called to Moses on the seventh day from within the cloud.

raw: וּמַרְאֵה כְּבוֹד יְהוָה כְּאֵשׁ אֹכֶלֶת בְּרֹאשׁ הָהָר לְעֵינֵי בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the appearance of the glory of the Lord was like a consuming fire on the top of the mountain in the eyes of the children of Israel.

raw: וַיָּבֹא מֹשֶׁה בְּתוֹךְ הֶעָנָן וַיַּעַל אֶל־הָהָר וַיְהִי מֹשֶׁה בָּהָר אַרְבָּעִים יוֹם וְאַרְבָּעִים לָיְלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses came into the midst of the cloud and went up to the mountain. And Moses was on the mountain forty days and forty nights.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying:

raw: דַּבֵּר אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְיִקְחוּ־לִי תְּרוּמָה מֵאֵת כָּל־אִישׁ אֲשֶׁר יִדְּבֶנּוּ לִבּוֹ תִּקְחוּ אֶת־תְּרוּמָתִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Speak to the children of Israel, that they take for Me an offering; from every man whose heart moves him you shall take My offering.

raw: וְזֹאת הַתְּרוּמָה אֲשֶׁר תִּקְחוּ מֵאִתָּם זָהָב וָכֶסֶף וּנְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this is the offering which you shall take from them: gold, and silver, and brass.

raw: וּתְכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ וְעִזִּים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats' hair.

raw: וְעֹרֹת אֵילִם מְאָדָּמִים וְעֹרֹת תְּחָשִׁים וַעֲצֵי שִׁטִּים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and rams' skins dyed red, and hides of sea cows, and acacia wood.

raw: שֶׁמֶן לַמָּאֹר בְּשָׂמִים לְשֶׁמֶן הַמִּשְׁחָה וְלִקְטֹרֶת הַסַּמִּים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Oil for the light, spices for the anointing oil and for the incense of spices.

raw: אַבְנֵי־שֹׁהַם וְאַבְנֵי מִלֻּאִים לָאֵפֹד וְלַחֹשֶׁן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Onyx stones and setting stones for the ephod and for the breastplate.

raw: וְעָשׂוּ לִי מִקְדָּשׁ וְשָׁכַנְתִּי בְּתוֹכָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And let them make Me a sanctuary, that I may dwell among them.

raw: כְּכֹל אֲשֶׁר אֲנִי מַרְאֶה אוֹתְךָ אֵת תַּבְנִית הַמִּשְׁכָּן וְאֵת תַּבְנִית כָּל־כֵּלָיו וְכֵן תַּעֲשׂוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: According to all that I am showing you, the pattern of the tabernacle and the pattern of all its furnishings, so you shall make it.

raw: וְעָשׂוּ אֲרוֹן עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים אַמָּתַיִם וָחֵצִי אָרְכּוֹ וְאַמָּה וָחֵצִי רָחְבּוֹ וְאַמָּה וָחֵצִי קֹמָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall make an ark of acacia wood: two cubits and a half shall be its length, and a cubit and a half its width, and a cubit and a half its height.

raw: וְצִפִּיתָ אֹתוֹ זָהָב טָהוֹר מִבַּיִת וּמִחוּץ תְּצַפֶּנּוּ וְעָשִׂיתָ עָלָיו זֵר זָהָב סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall overlay it with pure gold; inside and outside you shall overlay it, and you shall make a molding of gold all around it.

raw: וְיָצַקְתָּ לּוֹ אַרְבַּע טַבְּעֹת זָהָב וְנָתַתָּה עַל אַרְבַּע פַּעֲמֹתָיו וּשְׁתֵּי טַבָּעֹת עַל־צַלְעוֹ הָאֶחָת וּשְׁתֵּי טַבָּעֹת עַל־צַלְעוֹ הַשֵּׁנִית׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall cast for it four rings of gold and place them on its four legs, two rings on one side of it and two rings on the other side of it.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ בַדֵּי עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים וְצִפִּיתָ אֹתָם זָהָב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make poles of acacia wood and overlay them with gold.

raw: וְהֵבֵאתָ אֶת־הַבַּדִּים בַּטַּבָּעֹת עַל צַלְעֹת הָאָרֹן לָשֵׂאת אֶת־הָאָרֹן בָּהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put the poles into the rings on the sides of the ark, to carry the ark by them.

raw: בְּטַבְּעֹת הָאָרֹן יִהְיוּ הַבַּדִּים לֹא יָסֻרוּ מִמֶּנּוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The poles shall remain in the rings of the ark; they shall not be removed from it.

raw: וְנָתַתָּ אֶל־הָאָרֹן אֵת הָעֵדֻת אֲשֶׁר אֶתֵּן אֵלֶיךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put into the ark the testimony that I will give you.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ כַפֹּרֶת זָהָב טָהוֹר אַמָּתַיִם וָחֵצִי אָרְכָּהּ וְאַמָּה וָחֵצִי רָחְבָּהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a cover of pure gold: two and a half cubits shall be its length, and a cubit and a half its width.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ שְׁנַיִם כְּרֻבִים זָהָב מִקְשָׁה תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתָם מִשְּׁנֵי קְצוֹת הַכַּפֹּרֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make two cherubim of gold; of hammered work shall you make them, at the two ends of the mercy seat.

raw: וַעֲשֵׂה כְּרוּב אֶחָד מִקָּצָה מִזֶּה וּכְרוּב־אֶחָד מִקָּצָה מִזֶּה מִן־הַכַּפֹּרֶת תַּעֲשׂוּ אֶת־הַכְּרֻבִים עַל־שְׁנֵי קְצוֹתָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And make one cherub on the end from this side, and one cherub on the end from that side; you shall make the cherubim of the cover on its two ends.

raw: וְהָיוּ הַכְּרֻבִים פֹּרְשֵׂי כְנָפַיִם לְמַעְלָה סֹכְכִים בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם עַל־הַכַּפֹּרֶת וּפְנֵיהֶם אִישׁ אֶל־אָחִיו אֶל־הַכַּפֹּרֶת יִהְיוּ פְּנֵי הַכְּרֻבִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cherubim shall spread out their wings upward, covering the mercy seat with their wings, with their faces toward each other; the faces of the cherubim shall be toward the mercy seat.

raw: וְנָתַתָּ אֶת־הַכַּפֹּרֶת עַל־הָאָרֹן מִלְמָעְלָה וְאֶל־הָאָרֹן תִּתֵּן אֶת־הָעֵדֻת אֲשֶׁר אֶתֵּן אֵלֶיךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put the mercy seat on top of the ark, and in the ark you shall put the testimony that I will give you.

raw: וְנוֹעַדְתִּי לְךָ שָׁם וְדִבַּרְתִּי אִתְּךָ מֵעַל הַכַּפֹּרֶת מִבֵּין שְׁנֵי הַכְּרֻבִים אֲשֶׁר עַל־אֲרֹן הָעֵדֻת אֵת כָּל־אֲשֶׁר אֲצַוֶּה אוֹתְךָ אֶל־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And I will meet with you there, and I will speak with you from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubim that are on the ark of the testimony, all that I will command you concerning the children of Israel.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ שֻׁלְחָן עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים אַמָּתַיִם אָרְכּוֹ וְאַמָּה רָחְבּוֹ וְאַמָּה וָחֵצִי קֹמָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a table of acacia wood; two cubits shall be its length, a cubit its width, and a cubit and a half its height.

raw: וְצִפִּיתָ אֹתוֹ זָהָב טָהוֹר וְעָשִׂיתָ לּוֹ זֵר זָהָב סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall overlay it with pure gold, and you shall make for it a border of gold all around.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ לּוֹ מִסְגֶּרֶת טֹפַח סָבִיב וְעָשִׂיתָ זֵר־זָהָב לְמִסְגַּרְתּוֹ סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make for it a border of a handbreadth around, and you shall make a molding of gold for its border around.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ לּוֹ אַרְבַּע טַבְּעֹת זָהָב וְנָתַתָּ אֶת־הַטַּבָּעֹת עַל אַרְבַּע הַפֵּאֹת אֲשֶׁר לְאַרְבַּע רַגְלָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make for it four rings of gold, and you shall put the rings on the four corners which are on its four legs.

raw: לְעֻמַּת הַמִּסְגֶּרֶת תִּהְיֶיןָ הַטַּבָּעֹת לְבָתִּים לְבַדִּים לָשֵׂאת אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: As for the framework, the rings shall serve as holders for the poles, for carrying the table.
ai_data.tone: Descriptive, technical (likely from an instruction manual or biblical context)

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ אֶת־הַבַּדִּים עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים וְצִפִּיתָ אֹתָם זָהָב וְנִשָּׂא־בָם אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make the poles of acacia wood and overlay them with gold, and the table shall be carried by them.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ קְּעָרֹתָיו וְכַפֹּתָיו וּקְשׂוֹתָיו וּמְנַקִּיֹּתָיו אֲשֶׁר יֻסַּךְ בָּהֵן זָהָב טָהוֹר תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make its bowls and its ladles, its pitchers and its sprinkling bowls with which libations are poured; of pure gold you shall make them.

raw: וְנָתַתָּ עַל־הַשֻּׁלְחָן לֶחֶם פָּנִים לְפָנַי תָּמִיד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall place on the table bread of the Presence before Me always.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ מְנֹרַת זָהָב טָהוֹר מִקְשָׁה תֵּעָשֶׂה הַמְּנוֹרָה יְרֵכָהּ וְקָנָהּ גְּבִיעֶיהָ כַּפְתֹּרֶיהָ וּפְרָחֶיהָ מִמֶּנָּה יִהְיוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a lampstand of pure gold. The lampstand shall be made of hammered work; its base and its shaft, its cups, its knobs, and its flowers shall be of one piece with it.

raw: וְשִׁשָּׁה קָנִים יֹצְאִים מִצִּדֶּיהָ שְׁלֹשָׁה קְנֵי מְנֹרָה מִצִּדָּהּ הָאֶחָד וּשְׁלֹשָׁה קְנֵי מְנֹרָה מִצִּדָּהּ הַשֵּׁנִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And six branches coming out from its sides, three menorah branches from its one side, and three menorah branches from its second side.

raw: שְׁלֹשָׁה גְבִעִים מְשֻׁקָּדִים בַּקָּנֶה הָאֶחָד כַּפְתֹּר וָפֶרַח וּשְׁלֹשָׁה גְבִעִים מְשֻׁקָּדִים בַּקָּנֶה הָאֶחָד כַּפְתֹּר וָפָרַח כֵּן לְשֵׁשֶׁת הַקָּנִים הַיֹּצְאִים מִן־הַמְּנֹרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Three cups made like almonds on one branch, with a knob and a flower; and three cups made like almonds on one branch, with a knob and a flower -- so for the six branches going out of the lampstand.

raw: וּבַמְּנֹרָה אַרְבָּעָה גְבִעִים מְשֻׁקָּדִים כַּפְתֹּרֶיהָ וּפְרָחֶיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And in the menorah were four cups fashioned like almond blossoms, its knobs and its flowers.

raw: וְכַפְתֹּר תַּחַת שְׁנֵי הַקָּנִים מִמֶּנָּה וְכַפְתֹּר תַּחַת שְׁנֵי הַקָּנִים מִמֶּנָּה וְכַפְתֹּר תַּחַת־שְׁנֵי הַקָּנִים מִמֶּנָּה לְשֵׁשֶׁת הַקָּנִים הַיֹּצְאִים מִן־הַמְּנֹרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And a knop under two branches from it, and a knop under two branches from it, and a knop under two branches from it, for the six branches going out of the menorah.

raw: כַּפְתֹּרֵיהֶם וּקְנֹתָם מִמֶּנָּה יִהְיוּ כֻּלָּהּ מִקְשָׁה אַחַת זָהָב טָהוֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Their knobs and their branches shall be of one piece; all of it shall be one hammered work of pure gold.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ אֶת־נֵרֹתֶיהָ שִׁבְעָה וְהֶעֱלָה אֶת־נֵרֹתֶיהָ וְהֵאִיר עַל־עֵבֶר פָּנֶיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make its seven lamps, and he shall light its lamps so that it shines on the front of it.

raw: וּמַלְקָחֶיהָ וּמַחְתֹּתֶיהָ זָהָב טָהוֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And its tongs and its firepans were of pure gold.
ai_data.tone: Descriptive, matter-of-fact, historical (likely relating to the Tabernacle/Temple)

raw: כִּכָּר זָהָב טָהוֹר יַעֲשֶׂה אֹתָהּ אֵת כָּל־הַכֵּלִים הָאֵלֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He shall make it of a talent of pure gold, with all these utensils.

raw: וּרְאֵה וַעֲשֵׂה בְּתַבְנִיתָם אֲשֶׁר־אַתָּה מָרְאֶה בָּהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And see and make [it] according to their pattern which you are being shown on the mountain.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to see, to perceive, to understand
to do, to make, to create
to show, to cause to see (Hophal stem)

raw: וְאֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּן תַּעֲשֶׂה עֶשֶׂר יְרִיעֹת שֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר וּתְכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתֹלַעַת שָׁנִי כְּרֻבִים מַעֲשֵׂה חֹשֵׁב תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the tabernacle you shall make [of] ten curtains [of] fine twisted linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet; cherubim [the] work of a skillful designer you shall make them.

raw: אֹרֶךְ הַיְרִיעָה הָאַחַת שְׁמֹנֶה וְעֶשְׂרִים בָּאַמָּה וְרֹחַב אַרְבַּע בָּאַמָּה הַיְרִיעָה הָאֶחָת מִדָּה אַחַת לְכָל־הַיְרִיעֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The length of the one curtain was twenty-eight cubits, and the width four cubits for the one curtain; the same measure for all the curtains.

raw: חֲמֵשׁ הַיְרִיעֹת תִּהְיֶיןָ חֹבְרֹת אִשָּׁה אֶל־אֲחֹתָהּ וְחָמֵשׁ יְרִיעֹת חֹבְרֹת אִשָּׁה אֶל־אֲחֹתָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Five curtains shall be joined one to another; and five curtains shall be joined one to another.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ לֻלְאֹת תְּכֵלֶת עַל שְׂפַת הַיְרִיעָה הָאֶחָת מִקָּצָה בַּחֹבָרֶת וְכֵן תַּעֲשֶׂה בִּשְׂפַת הַיְרִיעָה הַקִּיצוֹנָה בַּמַּחְבֶּרֶת הַשֵּׁנִית׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make loops of blue on the edge of the one curtain from the edge in the joining; and likewise you shall make in the edge of the outermost curtain, in the second joining.

raw: חֲמִשִּׁים לֻלָאֹת תַּעֲשֶׂה בַּיְרִיעָה הָאֶחָת וַחֲמִשִּׁים לֻלָאֹת תַּעֲשֶׂה בִּקְצֵה הַיְרִיעָה אֲשֶׁר בַּמַּחְבֶּרֶת הַשֵּׁנִית מַקְבִּילֹת הַלֻּלָאֹת אִשָּׁה אֶל־אֲחֹתָהּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Fifty loops you shall make in the one curtain, and fifty loops you shall make on the edge of the curtain that is in the second set; the loops shall correspond one to another.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ חֲמִשִּׁים קַרְסֵי זָהָב וְחִבַּרְתָּ אֶת־הַיְרִיעֹת אִשָּׁה אֶל־אֲחֹתָהּ בַּקְּרָסִים וְהָיָה הַמִּשְׁכָּן אֶחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make fifty clasps of gold, and join the curtains one to another with the clasps, so that the tabernacle may be a single unit.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ יְרִיעֹת עִזִּים לְאֹהֶל עַל־הַמִּשְׁכָּן עַשְׁתֵּי־עֶשְׂרֵה יְרִיעֹת תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make curtains of goats' hair for a tent over the tabernacle; eleven curtains you shall make them.

raw: אֹרֶךְ הַיְרִיעָה הָאַחַת שְׁלֹשִׁים בָּאַמָּה וְרֹחַב אַרְבַּע בָּאַמָּה הַיְרִיעָה הָאֶחָת מִדָּה אַחַת לְעַשְׁתֵּי עֶשְׂרֵה יְרִיעֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The length of the one curtain was thirty cubits, and the width four cubits; the one curtain had one measurement for the eleven curtains.

raw: וְחִבַּרְתָּ אֶת־חֲמֵשׁ הַיְרִיעֹת לְבָד וְאֶת־שֵׁשׁ הַיְרִיעֹת לְבָד וְכָפַלְתָּ אֶת־הַיְרִיעָה הַשִּׁשִּׁית אֶל־מוּל פְּנֵי הָאֹהֶל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall join five curtains by themselves, and the six curtains by themselves, and you shall double over the sixth curtain in front of the tent.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ חֲמִשִּׁים לֻלָאֹת עַל שְׂפַת הַיְרִיעָה הָאֶחָת הַקִּיצֹנָה בַּחֹבָרֶת וַחֲמִשִּׁים לֻלָאֹת עַל שְׂפַת הַיְרִיעָה הַחֹבֶרֶת הַשֵּׁנִית׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make fifty loops on the edge of the one curtain at the extremity in the joining, and fifty loops on the edge of the curtain joining the second.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ קַרְסֵי נְחֹשֶׁת חֲמִשִּׁים וְהֵבֵאתָ אֶת־הַקְּרָסִים בַּלֻּלָאֹת וְחִבַּרְתָּ אֶת־הָאֹהֶל וְהָיָה אֶחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make fifty clasps of copper, and you shall bring the clasps into the loops, and you shall join the tent together, so that it may be one.

raw: וְסֶרַח הָעֹדֵף בִּירִיעֹת הָאֹהֶל חֲצִי הַיְרִיעָה הָעֹדֶפֶת תִּסְרַח עַל אֲחֹרֵי הַמִּשְׁכָּן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the excess flap of the tent cloths, half the cloth that remains over, shall hang over the back of the tabernacle.

raw: וְהָאַמָּה מִזֶּה וְהָאַמָּה מִזֶּה בָּעֹדֵף בְּאֹרֶךְ יְרִיעֹת הָאֹהֶל יִהְיֶה סָרוּחַ עַל־צִדֵּי הַמִּשְׁכָּן מִזֶּה וּמִזֶּה לְכַסֹּתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the cubit on this side, and the cubit on that side, of what remains in the length of the tent cloths, shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle on this side and on that side, to cover it.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ מִכְסֶה לָאֹהֶל עֹרֹת אֵילִם מְאָדָּמִים וּמִכְסֵה עֹרֹת תְּחָשִׁים מִלְמָעְלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a covering for the tent of rams' skins dyed red, and a covering of tachash skins above.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ אֶת־הַקְּרָשִׁים לַמִּשְׁכָּן עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים עֹמְדִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make the planks for the tabernacle of acacia wood, standing upright.

raw: עֶשֶׂר אַמּוֹת אֹרֶךְ הַקָּרֶשׁ וְאַמָּה וַחֲצִי הָאַמָּה רֹחַב הַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Ten cubits the length of the board, and a cubit and a half the width of each board.

raw: שְׁתֵּי יָדוֹת לַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד מְשֻׁלָּבֹת אִשָּׁה אֶל־אֲחֹתָהּ כֵּן תַּעֲשֶׂה לְכֹל קַרְשֵׁי הַמִּשְׁכָּן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Two tenons shall there be to one board, joined one to another: thus shalt thou make for all the boards of the tabernacle.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ אֶת־הַקְּרָשִׁים לַמִּשְׁכָּן עֶשְׂרִים קֶרֶשׁ לִפְאַת נֶגְבָּה תֵימָנָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make the planks for the tabernacle: twenty planks for the south side, the Negev, southward.

raw: וְאַרְבָּעִים אַדְנֵי־כֶסֶף תַּעֲשֶׂה תַּחַת עֶשְׂרִים הַקָּרֶשׁ שְׁנֵי אֲדָנִים תַּחַת־הַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד לִשְׁתֵּי יְדֹתָיו וּשְׁנֵי אֲדָנִים תַּחַת־הַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד לִשְׁתֵּי יְדֹתָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And forty sockets of silver you shall make under the twenty boards: two sockets under one board for its two tenons, and two sockets under the other board for its two tenons.

raw: וּלְצֶלַע הַמִּשְׁכָּן הַשֵּׁנִית לִפְאַת צָפוֹן עֶשְׂרִים קָרֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the second side of the Tabernacle, for the north side, twenty boards.

raw: וְאַרְבָּעִים אַדְנֵיהֶם כָּסֶף שְׁנֵי אֲדָנִים תַּחַת הַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד וּשְׁנֵי אֲדָנִים תַּחַת הַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.

raw: וּלְיַרְכְּתֵי הַמִּשְׁכָּן יָמָּה תַּעֲשֶׂה שִׁשָּׁה קְרָשִׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the back of the Tabernacle, westward, you shall make six boards.

raw: וּשְׁנֵי קְרָשִׁים תַּעֲשֶׂה לִמְקֻצְעֹת הַמִּשְׁכָּן בַּיַּרְכָתָיִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make two planks for the corners of the Tabernacle at the rear.

raw: וְיִהְיוּ תֹאֲמִים מִלְּמַטָּה וְיַחְדָּו יִהְיוּ תַמִּים עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ אֶל־הַטַּבַּעַת הָאֶחָת כֵּן יִהְיֶה לִשְׁנֵיהֶם לִשְׁנֵי הַמִּקְצֹעֹת יִהְיוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall be twins from below, and together they shall be complete at its top to the one ring. Thus it shall be for both of them; for the two corners they shall be.

raw: וְהָיוּ שְׁמֹנָה קְרָשִׁים וְאַדְנֵיהֶם כֶּסֶף שִׁשָּׁה עָשָׂר אֲדָנִים שְׁנֵי אֲדָנִים תַּחַת הַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד וּשְׁנֵי אֲדָנִים תַּחַת הַקֶּרֶשׁ הָאֶחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And there shall be eight boards with their sockets of silver, sixteen sockets; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under the other board.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ בְרִיחִם עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים חֲמִשָּׁה לְקַרְשֵׁי צֶלַע־הַמִּשְׁכָּן הָאֶחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make bars of acacia wood, five for the boards of one side of the tabernacle.

raw: וַחֲמִשָּׁה בְרִיחִם לְקַרְשֵׁי צֶלַע־הַמִּשְׁכָּן הַשֵּׁנִית וַחֲמִשָּׁה בְרִיחִם לְקַרְשֵׁי צֶלַע הַמִּשְׁכָּן לַיַּרְכָתַיִם יָמָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And five bars for the planks of the side of the tabernacle, the second side, and five bars for the planks of the side of the tabernacle, for the rear westward.

raw: וְהַבְּרִיחַ הַתִּיכֹן בְּתוֹךְ הַקְּרָשִׁים מַבְרִחַ מִן־הַקָּצֶה אֶל־הַקָּצֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the middle bar in the midst of the boards shall run from end to end.

raw: וְאֶת־הַקְּרָשִׁים תְּצַפֶּה זָהָב וְאֶת־טַבְּעֹתֵיהֶם תַּעֲשֶׂה זָהָב בָּתִּים לַבְּרִיחִם וְצִפִּיתָ אֶת־הַבְּרִיחִם זָהָב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the boards you shall overlay with gold, and their rings you shall make of gold as holders for the bars, and you shall overlay the bars with gold.

raw: וַהֲקֵמֹתָ אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּן כְּמִשְׁפָּטוֹ אֲשֶׁר הָרְאֵיתָ בָּהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall erect the Tabernacle according to its pattern which you were shown on the mountain.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ פָרֹכֶת תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר מַעֲשֵׂה חֹשֵׁב יַעֲשֶׂה אֹתָהּ כְּרֻבִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a veil of blue and purple and scarlet yarn and fine twined linen; it shall be made with cherubim, the work of a skilled craftsman.

raw: וְנָתַתָּה אֹתָהּ עַל־אַרְבָּעָה עַמּוּדֵי שִׁטִּים מְצֻפִּים זָהָב וָוֵיהֶם זָהָב עַל־אַרְבָּעָה אַדְנֵי־כָסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall place it on four pillars of acacia wood overlaid with gold, their hooks gold, upon four bases of silver.

raw: וְנָתַתָּה אֶת־הַפָּרֹכֶת תַּחַת הַקְּרָסִים וְהֵבֵאתָ שָׁמָּה מִבֵּית לַפָּרֹכֶת אֵת אֲרוֹן הָעֵדוּת וְהִבְדִּילָה הַפָּרֹכֶת לָכֶם בֵּין הַקֹּדֶשׁ וּבֵין קֹדֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put the veil under the clasps, and you shall bring there within the veil the ark of the testimony. And the veil shall divide for you between the Holy Place and the Most Holy Place.

raw: וְנָתַתָּ אֶת־הַכַּפֹּרֶת עַל אֲרוֹן הָעֵדֻת בְּקֹדֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put the mercy seat on the ark of the testimony in the Most Holy Place.

raw: וְשַׂמְתָּ אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָן מִחוּץ לַפָּרֹכֶת וְאֶת־הַמְּנֹרָה נֹכַח הַשֻּׁלְחָן עַל צֶלַע הַמִּשְׁכָּן תֵּימָנָה וְהַשֻּׁלְחָן תִּתֵּן עַל־צֶלַע צָפוֹן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put the table outside the veil, and the lampstand opposite the table on the side of the tabernacle southward; and you shall put the table on the north side.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ מָסָךְ לְפֶתַח הָאֹהֶל תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר מַעֲשֵׂה רֹקֵם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a screen for the entrance of the tent, of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and fine twisted linen, the work of an embroiderer.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ לַמָּסָךְ חֲמִשָּׁה עַמּוּדֵי שִׁטִּים וְצִפִּיתָ אֹתָם זָהָב וָוֵיהֶם זָהָב וְיָצַקְתָּ לָהֶם חֲמִשָּׁה אַדְנֵי נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make for the screen five pillars of acacia wood, and overlay them with gold, their hooks of gold; and you shall cast for them five sockets of copper.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ אֶת־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים חָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת אֹרֶךְ וְחָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת רֹחַב רָבוּעַ יִהְיֶה הַמִּזְבֵּחַ וְשָׁלֹשׁ אַמּוֹת קֹמָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make the altar of acacia wood; five cubits shall be the length, and five cubits the breadth; the altar shall be square: and its height shall be three cubits.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ קַרְנֹתָיו עַל אַרְבַּע פִּנֹּתָיו מִמֶּנּוּ תִּהְיֶיןָ קַרְנֹתָיו וְצִפִּיתָ אֹתוֹ נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make its horns on its four corners; its horns shall be of one piece with it. And you shall overlay it with bronze.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ סִּירֹתָיו לְדַשְּׁנוֹ וְיָעָיו וּמִזְרְקֹתָיו וּמִזְלְגֹתָיו וּמַחְתֹּתָיו לְכָל־כֵּלָיו תַּעֲשֶׂה נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make its pots for removing the ashes, and its shovels, and its basins, and its forks, and its firepans; all its utensils you shall make of copper.
hebrew_roots: דשׁן (d-š-n): to be fat, rich, remove ashes

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ לּוֹ מִכְבָּר מַעֲשֵׂה רֶשֶׁת נְחֹשֶׁת וְעָשִׂיתָ עַל־הָרֶשֶׁת אַרְבַּע טַבְּעֹת נְחֹשֶׁת עַל אַרְבַּע קְצוֹתָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make for it a grating of network of copper, and you shall make on the network four rings of copper at its four corners.

raw: וְנָתַתָּה אֹתָהּ תַּחַת כַּרְכֹּב הַמִּזְבֵּחַ מִלְּמָטָּה וְהָיְתָה הָרֶשֶׁת עַד חֲצִי הַמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall place it under the ledge of the altar, below, and the net shall reach halfway up the altar.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ בַדִּים לַמִּזְבֵּחַ בַּדֵּי עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים וְצִפִּיתָ אֹתָם נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make poles for the altar, poles of acacia wood, and overlay them with bronze.

raw: וְהוּבָא אֶת־בַּדָּיו בַּטַּבָּעֹת וְהָיוּ הַבַּדִּים עַל־שְׁתֵּי צַלְעֹת הַמִּזְבֵּחַ בִּשְׂאֵת אֹתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he shall put its poles into the rings, so that the poles shall be on the two sides of the altar when it is carried.

raw: נְבוּב לֻחֹת תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתוֹ כַּאֲשֶׁר הֶרְאָה אֹתְךָ בָּהָר כֵּן יַעֲשׂוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: You shall make it hollow with boards; as you were shown on the mountain, so they shall make [it].

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ אֵת חֲצַר הַמִּשְׁכָּן לִפְאַת נֶגֶב־תֵּימָנָה קְלָעִים לֶחָצֵר שֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר מֵאָה בָאַמָּה אֹרֶךְ לַפֵּאָה הָאֶחָת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make the courtyard of the tabernacle; for the south side, toward the south, hangings for the courtyard of fine twined linen, one hundred cubits long for one side.

raw: וְעַמֻּדָיו עֶשְׂרִים וְאַדְנֵיהֶם עֶשְׂרִים נְחֹשֶׁת וָוֵי הָעַמֻּדִים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶם כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And its pillars were twenty, and their sockets twenty, of bronze; the hooks of the pillars and their bands were silver.

raw: וְכֵן לִפְאַת צָפוֹן בָּאֹרֶךְ קְלָעִים מֵאָה אֹרֶךְ ועמדו [וְעַמּוּדָיו] עֶשְׂרִים וְאַדְנֵיהֶם עֶשְׂרִים נְחֹשֶׁת וָוֵי הָעַמֻּדִים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶם כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And likewise for the north side, along the length, there were woven hangings, one hundred cubits long, and their posts were twenty, and their twenty bases were bronze, the hooks of the posts and their connecting rods were silver.

raw: וְרֹחַב הֶחָצֵר לִפְאַת־יָם קְלָעִים חֲמִשִּׁים אַמָּה עַמֻּדֵיהֶם עֲשָׂרָה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם עֲשָׂרָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the width of the courtyard on the west side was fifty cubits, their pillars ten, and their sockets ten.

raw: וְרֹחַב הֶחָצֵר לִפְאַת קֵדְמָה מִזְרָחָה חֲמִשִּׁים אַמָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the width of the courtyard on the east side, eastward, was fifty cubits.

raw: וַחֲמֵשׁ עֶשְׂרֵה אַמָּה קְלָעִים לַכָּתֵף עַמֻּדֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And fifteen cubits [were] the hangings for the side; their pillars [were] three, and their sockets [were] three.

raw: וְלַכָּתֵף הַשֵּׁנִית חְמֵשׁ עֶשְׂרֵה קְלָעִים עַמֻּדֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the second side, fifteen hangings, their pillars three, and their sockets three.

raw: וּלְשַׁעַר הֶחָצֵר מָסָךְ עֶשְׂרִים אַמָּה תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר מַעֲשֵׂה רֹקֵם עַמֻּדֵיהֶם אַרְבָּעָה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם אַרְבָּעָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the gate of the courtyard, a screen of twenty cubits, of blue and purple and scarlet stuff and fine twined linen, the work of an embroiderer, their pillars four and their sockets four.

raw: כָּל־עַמּוּדֵי הֶחָצֵר סָבִיב מְחֻשָּׁקִים כֶּסֶף וָוֵיהֶם כָּסֶף וְאַדְנֵיהֶם נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the pillars of the court round about were filleted with silver; their hooks were silver; and their sockets were bronze.

raw: אֹרֶךְ הֶחָצֵר מֵאָה בָאַמָּה וְרֹחַב חֲמִשִּׁים בַּחֲמִשִּׁים וְקֹמָה חָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת שֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר וְאַדְנֵיהֶם נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: The length of the court was a hundred cubits, and the width fifty by fifty, and the height five cubits of fine twisted linen, and their sockets were bronze.

raw: לְכֹל כְּלֵי הַמִּשְׁכָּן בְּכֹל עֲבֹדָתוֹ וְכָל־יְתֵדֹתָיו וְכָל־יִתְדֹת הֶחָצֵר נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For all the utensils of the tabernacle in all its service, and all its pegs and all the pegs of the courtyard, of bronze.

raw: וְאַתָּה תְּצַוֶּה אֶת־בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְיִקְחוּ אֵלֶיךָ שֶׁמֶן זַיִת זָךְ כָּתִית לַמָּאוֹר לְהַעֲלֹת נֵר תָּמִיד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall command the children of Israel, that they take for you pure olive oil, beaten, for the light, to cause a lamp to burn continually.

raw: בְּאֹהֶל מוֹעֵד מִחוּץ לַפָּרֹכֶת אֲשֶׁר עַל־הָעֵדֻת יַעֲרֹךְ אֹתוֹ אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו מֵעֶרֶב עַד־בֹּקֶר לִפְנֵי יְהוָה חֻקַּת עוֹלָם לְדֹרֹתָם מֵאֵת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: In the tent of meeting, outside the curtain that is over the testimony, Aaron and his sons shall keep it in order from evening to morning before the Lord. It shall be a statute forever throughout their generations from the people of Israel.

raw: וְאַתָּה הַקְרֵב אֵלֶיךָ אֶת־אַהֲרֹן אָחִיךָ וְאֶת־בָּנָיו אִתּוֹ מִתּוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְכַהֲנוֹ־לִי אַהֲרֹן נָדָב וַאֲבִיהוּא אֶלְעָזָר וְאִיתָמָר בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you, bring near to yourself Aaron your brother, and his sons with him, from among the children of Israel, to minister to me: Aaron, Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar, Aaron's sons.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ בִגְדֵי־קֹדֶשׁ לְאַהֲרֹן אָחִיךָ לְכָבוֹד וּלְתִפְאָרֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make holy garments for Aaron your brother, for honor and for beauty.

raw: וְאַתָּה תְּדַבֵּר אֶל־כָּל־חַכְמֵי־לֵב אֲשֶׁר מִלֵּאתִיו רוּחַ חָכְמָה וְעָשׂוּ אֶת־בִּגְדֵי אַהֲרֹן לְקַדְּשׁוֹ לְכַהֲנוֹ־לִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall speak to all the wise-hearted, whom I have filled with the spirit of wisdom, that they make Aaron's garments to consecrate him, that he may minister as priest to me.

raw: וְאֵלֶּה הַבְּגָדִים אֲשֶׁר יַעֲשׂוּ חֹשֶׁן וְאֵפוֹד וּמְעִיל וּכְתֹנֶת תַּשְׁבֵּץ מִצְנֶפֶת וְאַבְנֵט וְעָשׂוּ בִגְדֵי־קֹדֶשׁ לְאַהֲרֹן אָחִיךָ וּלְבָנָיו לְכַהֲנוֹ־לִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And these are the garments which they shall make: a breastplate, an ephod, a robe, a tunic of checkered work, a turban, and a sash. They shall make holy garments for Aaron your brother and his sons, that they may minister as priests to me.

raw: וְהֵם יִקְחוּ אֶת־הַזָּהָב וְאֶת־הַתְּכֵלֶת וְאֶת־הָאַרְגָּמָן וְאֶת־תּוֹלַעַת הַשָּׁנִי וְאֶת־הַשֵּׁשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall take the gold, and the blue, and the purple, and the scarlet, and the fine linen.

raw: וְעָשׂוּ אֶת־הָאֵפֹד זָהָב תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן תּוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר מַעֲשֵׂה חֹשֵׁב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall make the ephod of gold, of blue, and of purple, of scarlet, and fine twined linen, the work of a skilled craftsman.

raw: שְׁתֵּי כְתֵפֹת חֹבְרֹת יִהְיֶה־לּוֹ אֶל־שְׁנֵי קְצוֹתָיו וְחֻבָּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Two shoulder pieces joined he shall have at its two ends, and it shall be joined.

raw: וְחֵשֶׁב אֲפֻדָּתוֹ אֲשֶׁר עָלָיו כְּמַעֲשֵׂהוּ מִמֶּנּוּ יִהְיֶה זָהָב תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the skillfully woven band of the ephod, which is on it, shall be of the same workmanship, of one piece with it; of gold, blue, purple, scarlet, and fine twined linen.

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ אֶת־שְׁתֵּי אַבְנֵי־שֹׁהַם וּפִתַּחְתָּ עֲלֵיהֶם שְׁמוֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take the two stones of shoham, and engrave on them the names of the sons of Israel.

raw: שִׁשָּׁה מִשְּׁמֹתָם עַל הָאֶבֶן הָאֶחָת וְאֶת־שְׁמוֹת הַשִּׁשָּׁה הַנּוֹתָרִים עַל־הָאֶבֶן הַשֵּׁנִית כְּתוֹלְדֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Six of their names on the one stone, and the names of the remaining six on the other stone, according to their birth order.

raw: מַעֲשֵׂה חָרַשׁ אֶבֶן פִּתּוּחֵי חֹתָם תְּפַתַּח אֶת־שְׁתֵּי הָאֲבָנִים עַל־שְׁמֹת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מֻסַבֹּת מִשְׁבְּצוֹת זָהָב תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: With the work of an engraver in stone, like the engravings of a signet, you shall engrave the two stones with the names of the sons of Israel. You shall make them enclosed in settings of gold.

raw: וְשַׂמְתָּ אֶת־שְׁתֵּי הָאֲבָנִים עַל כִּתְפֹת הָאֵפֹד אַבְנֵי זִכָּרֹן לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְנָשָׂא אַהֲרֹן אֶת־שְׁמוֹתָם לִפְנֵי יְהוָה עַל־שְׁתֵּי כְתֵפָיו לְזִכָּרֹן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put the two stones on the shoulder pieces of the ephod, stones of remembrance for the sons of Israel. Aaron shall bear their names before the LORD on his two shoulders for remembrance.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ מִשְׁבְּצֹת זָהָב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make settings of gold.

raw: וּשְׁתֵּי שַׁרְשְׁרֹת זָהָב טָהוֹר מִגְבָּלֹת תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתָם מַעֲשֵׂה עֲבֹת וְנָתַתָּה אֶת־שַׁרְשְׁרֹת הָעֲבֹתֹת עַל־הַמִּשְׁבְּצֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And two chains of pure gold, you shall make them as braided cords; and you shall put the braided chains on the settings.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ חֹשֶׁן מִשְׁפָּט מַעֲשֵׂה חֹשֵׁב כְּמַעֲשֵׂה אֵפֹד תַּעֲשֶׂנּוּ זָהָב תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a breastplate of judgment, the work of a skilled craftsman; like the work of the ephod you shall make it; of gold, blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and fine twisted linen you shall make it.

raw: רָבוּעַ יִהְיֶה כָּפוּל זֶרֶת אָרְכּוֹ וְזֶרֶת רָחְבּוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: It shall be square; its length two spans and its width a span.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to be square, to be four

raw: וּמִלֵּאתָ בוֹ מִלֻּאַת אֶבֶן אַרְבָּעָה טוּרִים אָבֶן טוּר אֹדֶם פִּטְדָה וּבָרֶקֶת הַטּוּר הָאֶחָד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall fill it with settings of stones, four rows of stones: the first row a sardius, a topaz, and an emerald.

raw: וְהַטּוּר הַשֵּׁנִי נֹפֶךְ סַפִּיר וְיָהֲלֹם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the second row: carbuncle, sapphire, and diamond.

raw: וְהַטּוּר הַשְּׁלִישִׁי לֶשֶׁם שְׁבוֹ וְאַחְלָמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the third row, a jacinth, an agate, and an amethyst.

hebrew_roots.meaning: Agate (a precious stone) - possible alternative name or variant spelling. Root uncertain, often linked to שׁבה
Amethyst (a precious stone).  Root meaning related to dreaming.

raw: וְהַטּוּר הָרְבִיעִי תַּרְשִׁישׁ וְשֹׁהַם וְיָשְׁפֵה מְשֻׁבָּצִים זָהָב יִהְיוּ בְּמִלּוּאֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the fourth row, beryl, onyx, and jasper, shall be set in gold in their settings.

raw: וְהָאֲבָנִים תִּהְיֶיןָ עַל־שְׁמֹת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל שְׁתֵּים עֶשְׂרֵה עַל־שְׁמֹתָם פִּתּוּחֵי חוֹתָם אִישׁ עַל־שְׁמוֹ תִּהְיֶיןָ לִשְׁנֵי עָשָׂר שָׁבֶט׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the stones shall be according to the names of the sons of Israel, twelve, according to their names; they shall be like the engravings of a signet, each according to his name; they shall be for the twelve tribes.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ עַל־הַחֹשֶׁן שַׁרְשֹׁת גַּבְלֻת מַעֲשֵׂה עֲבֹת זָהָב טָהוֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make for the breastplate chains of braided workmanship, cords of pure gold.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ עַל־הַחֹשֶׁן שְׁתֵּי טַבְּעוֹת זָהָב וְנָתַתָּ אֶת־שְׁתֵּי הַטַּבָּעוֹת עַל־שְׁנֵי קְצוֹת הַחֹשֶׁן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make on the breastplate two rings of gold, and you shall put the two rings on the two ends of the breastplate.

raw: וְנָתַתָּה אֶת־שְׁתֵּי עֲבֹתֹת הַזָּהָב עַל־שְׁתֵּי הַטַּבָּעֹת אֶל־קְצוֹת הַחֹשֶׁן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put the two cords of gold on the two rings at the ends of the breastpiece.

raw: וְאֵת שְׁתֵּי קְצוֹת שְׁתֵּי הָעֲבֹתֹת תִּתֵּן עַל־שְׁתֵּי הַמִּשְׁבְּצוֹת וְנָתַתָּה עַל־כִּתְפוֹת הָאֵפֹד אֶל־מוּל פָּנָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the two ends of the two braided chains you shall put on the two settings and you shall attach them to the shoulder pieces of the ephod, at the front.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ שְׁתֵּי טַבְּעוֹת זָהָב וְשַׂמְתָּ אֹתָם עַל־שְׁנֵי קְצוֹת הַחֹשֶׁן עַל־שְׂפָתוֹ אֲשֶׁר אֶל־עֵבֶר הָאֵפֹד בָּיְתָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make two rings of gold, and you shall put them on the two edges of the breastpiece, on its edge that is toward the inner side of the ephod.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ שְׁתֵּי טַבְּעוֹת זָהָב וְנָתַתָּה אֹתָם עַל־שְׁתֵּי כִתְפוֹת הָאֵפוֹד מִלְּמַטָּה מִמּוּל פָּנָיו לְעֻמַּת מֶחְבַּרְתּוֹ מִמַּעַל לְחֵשֶׁב הָאֵפוֹד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make two gold rings and put them on the two shoulder pieces of the ephod, on the underside in front of it, close to its seam, above the waistband of the ephod.

raw: וְיִרְכְּסוּ אֶת־הַחֹשֶׁן מטבעתו [מִטַּבְּעֹתָיו] אֶל־טַבְּעֹת הָאֵפֹד בִּפְתִיל תְּכֵלֶת לִהְיוֹת עַל־חֵשֶׁב הָאֵפוֹד וְלֹא־יִזַּח הַחֹשֶׁן מֵעַל הָאֵפוֹד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall bind the breastplate by its rings to the rings of the ephod with a thread of blue, that it may be on the skillfully woven band of the ephod, and that the breastplate does not come loose from upon the ephod.

raw: וְנָשָׂא אַהֲרֹן אֶת־שְׁמוֹת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּחֹשֶׁן הַמִּשְׁפָּט עַל־לִבּוֹ בְּבֹאוֹ אֶל־הַקֹּדֶשׁ לְזִכָּרֹן לִפְנֵי־יְהוָה תָּמִיד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron shall bear the names of the sons of Israel in the breastplate of judgment upon his heart, when he goes into the holy place, for a memorial before the LORD continually.

raw: וְנָתַתָּ אֶל־חֹשֶׁן הַמִּשְׁפָּט אֶת־הָאוּרִים וְאֶת־הַתֻּמִּים וְהָיוּ עַל־לֵב אַהֲרֹן בְּבֹאוֹ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה וְנָשָׂא אַהֲרֹן אֶת־מִשְׁפַּט בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל עַל־לִבּוֹ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה תָּמִיד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall put in the breastplate of judgment the Urim and the Thummim, and they shall be upon Aaron's heart when he goes in before the LORD. Thus Aaron shall bear the judgment of the children of Israel on his heart before the LORD continually.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ אֶת־מְעִיל הָאֵפוֹד כְּלִיל תְּכֵלֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make the robe of the ephod all of blue.

raw: וְהָיָה פִי־רֹאשׁוֹ בְּתוֹכוֹ שָׂפָה יִהְיֶה לְפִיו סָבִיב מַעֲשֵׂה אֹרֵג כְּפִי תַחְרָא יִהְיֶה־לּוֹ לֹא יִקָּרֵעַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And its head opening shall be in its midst; it shall have a border all around its opening, like the work of a weaver, like the opening of a coat of mail, so that it will not tear.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ עַל־שׁוּלָיו רִמֹּנֵי תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי עַל־שׁוּלָיו סָבִיב וּפַעֲמֹנֵי זָהָב בְּתוֹכָם סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make on its hem pomegranates of blue, and purple, and scarlet, on its hem all around, and golden bells in their midst all around.

raw: פַּעֲמֹן זָהָב וְרִמּוֹן פַּעֲמֹן זָהָב וְרִמּוֹן עַל־שׁוּלֵי הַמְּעִיל סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: A golden bell and a pomegranate, a golden bell and a pomegranate, on the hem of the robe all around.

raw: וְהָיָה עַל־אַהֲרֹן לְשָׁרֵת וְנִשְׁמַע קוֹלוֹ בְּבֹאוֹ אֶל־הַקֹּדֶשׁ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה וּבְצֵאתוֹ וְלֹא יָמוּת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall be upon Aaron to minister, and his sound shall be heard when he goes into the Holy Place before the Lord and when he comes out, so that he does not die.

raw: וְעָשִׂיתָ צִּיץ זָהָב טָהוֹר וּפִתַּחְתָּ עָלָיו פִּתּוּחֵי חֹתָם קֹדֶשׁ לַיהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall make a plate of pure gold and engrave on it, like the engraving of a signet, 'Holy to the LORD.'

raw: וְשַׂמְתָּ אֹתוֹ עַל־פְּתִיל תְּכֵלֶת וְהָיָה עַל־הַמִּצְנָפֶת אֶל־מוּל פְּנֵי־הַמִּצְנֶפֶת יִהְיֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall place it on a cord of blue, and it shall be on the turban; it shall be opposite the front of the turban.

raw: וְהָיָה עַל־מֵצַח אַהֲרֹן וְנָשָׂא אַהֲרֹן אֶת־עֲוֺן הַקֳּדָשִׁים אֲשֶׁר יַקְדִּישׁוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְכָל־מַתְּנֹת קָדְשֵׁיהֶם וְהָיָה עַל־מִצְחוֹ תָּמִיד לְרָצוֹן לָהֶם לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall be upon Aaron's forehead, and Aaron shall bear the iniquity of the holy things that the children of Israel shall consecrate for all their holy gifts; and it shall always be upon his forehead, to win acceptance for them before the Lord.

raw: וְשִׁבַּצְתָּ הַכְּתֹנֶת שֵׁשׁ וְעָשִׂיתָ מִצְנֶפֶת שֵׁשׁ וְאַבְנֵט תַּעֲשֶׂה מַעֲשֵׂה רֹקֵם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall weave the tunic of fine linen, and you shall make a turban of fine linen, and you shall make a sash, the work of an embroiderer.

raw: וְלִבְנֵי אַהֲרֹן תַּעֲשֶׂה כֻתֳּנֹת וְעָשִׂיתָ לָהֶם אַבְנֵטִים וּמִגְבָּעוֹת תַּעֲשֶׂה לָהֶם לְכָבוֹד וּלְתִפְאָרֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the sons of Aaron you shall make tunics, and you shall make sashes for them, and you shall make caps for them, for honor and for beauty.

raw: וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ אֹתָם אֶת־אַהֲרֹן אָחִיךָ וְאֶת־בָּנָיו אִתּוֹ וּמָשַׁחְתָּ אֹתָם וּמִלֵּאתָ אֶת־יָדָם וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ אֹתָם וְכִהֲנוּ לִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall dress them, your brother Aaron and his sons with him, and you shall anoint them and ordain them and consecrate them, so that they may serve Me as priests.

hebrew_roots.meaning: to fill, to ordain (lit. to fill the hand)

raw: וַעֲשֵׂה לָהֶם מִכְנְסֵי־בָד לְכַסּוֹת בְּשַׂר עֶרְוָה מִמָּתְנַיִם וְעַד־יְרֵכַיִם יִהְיוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And make for them linen undergarments to cover the flesh of nakedness from the loins to the thighs; they shall be.

raw: וְהָיוּ עַל־אַהֲרֹן וְעַל־בָּנָיו בְּבֹאָם אֶל־אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד אוֹ בְגִשְׁתָּם אֶל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ לְשָׁרֵת בַּקֹּדֶשׁ וְלֹא־יִשְׂאוּ עָוֺן וָמֵתוּ חֻקַּת עוֹלָם לוֹ וּלְזַרְעוֹ אַחֲרָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And they shall be upon Aaron and upon his sons when they go into the Tent of Meeting, or when they come near to the altar to minister in the Holy Place, lest they bear sin and die. It shall be a statute forever for him and for his descendants after him.

raw: וְזֶה הַדָּבָר אֲשֶׁר־תַּעֲשֶׂה לָהֶם לְקַדֵּשׁ אֹתָם לְכַהֵן לִי לְקַח פַּר אֶחָד בֶּן־בָּקָר וְאֵילִם שְׁנַיִם תְּמִימִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And this is the thing that you shall do to them to consecrate them to minister to me: Take one young bull and two rams without blemish.

raw: וְלֶחֶם מַצּוֹת וְחַלֹּת מַצֹּת בְּלוּלֹת בַּשֶּׁמֶן וּרְקִיקֵי מַצּוֹת מְשֻׁחִים בַּשָּׁמֶן סֹלֶת חִטִּים תַּעֲשֶׂה אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And bread of unleavened bread, and unleavened wafers anointed with oil, of fine wheaten flour shall you make them.

raw: וְנָתַתָּ אוֹתָם עַל־סַל אֶחָד וְהִקְרַבְתָּ אֹתָם בַּסָּל וְאֶת־הַפָּר וְאֵת שְׁנֵי הָאֵילִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and you shall place them on one basket and you shall present them in the basket, and the bull and the two rams.

raw: וְאֶת־אַהֲרֹן וְאֶת־בָּנָיו תַּקְרִיב אֶל־פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְרָחַצְתָּ אֹתָם בַּמָּיִם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Aaron and his sons you shall bring near to the entrance of the tent of meeting, and you shall wash them with water.

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ אֶת־הַבְּגָדִים וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ אֶת־אַהֲרֹן אֶת־הַכֻּתֹּנֶת וְאֵת מְעִיל הָאֵפֹד וְאֶת־הָאֵפֹד וְאֶת־הַחֹשֶׁן וְאָפַדְתָּ לוֹ בְּחֵשֶׁב הָאֵפֹד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take the garments and dress Aaron with the tunic and with the robe of the ephod and with the ephod and with the breastplate and you shall gird him with the skillfully woven band of the ephod.

raw: וְשַׂמְתָּ הַמִּצְנֶפֶת עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ וְנָתַתָּ אֶת־נֵזֶר הַקֹּדֶשׁ עַל־הַמִּצְנָפֶת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall place the turban on his head, and you shall put the crown of holiness on the turban.

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ אֶת־שֶׁמֶן הַמִּשְׁחָה וְיָצַקְתָּ עַל־רֹאשׁוֹ וּמָשַׁחְתָּ אֹתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take the anointing oil and pour it on his head and anoint him.

raw: וְאֶת־בָּנָיו תַּקְרִיב וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּם כֻּתֳּנֹת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall bring near his sons, and you shall clothe them with tunics.

raw: וְחָגַרְתָּ אֹתָם אַבְנֵט אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו וְחָבַשְׁתָּ לָהֶם מִגְבָּעֹת וְהָיְתָה לָהֶם כְּהֻנָּה לְחֻקַּת עוֹלָם וּמִלֵּאתָ יַד־אַהֲרֹן וְיַד־בָּנָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall gird them with belts, Aaron and his sons, and you shall bind caps on them. And the priesthood shall be theirs by a statute forever. And you shall ordain Aaron and his sons.

raw: וְהִקְרַבְתָּ אֶת־הַפָּר לִפְנֵי אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְסָמַךְ אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו אֶת־יְדֵיהֶם עַל־רֹאשׁ הַפָּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall bring the bull to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting, and Aaron and his sons shall lay their hands on the head of the bull.
hebrew_roots: ק-ר-ב (Q-R-B): to draw near, to approach, to bring near
י-ע-ד (Y-`-D): to appoint, to meet (root related to 'moed')
ס-מ-ך (S-M-K): to lean, to support, to lay hands

raw: וְשָׁחַטְתָּ אֶת־הַפָּר לִפְנֵי יְהוָה פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall slaughter the bull before Yahweh, at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ מִדַּם הַפָּר וְנָתַתָּה עַל־קַרְנֹת הַמִּזְבֵּחַ בְּאֶצְבָּעֶךָ וְאֶת־כָּל־הַדָּם תִּשְׁפֹּךְ אֶל־יְסוֹד הַמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take from the blood of the bull, and you shall put on the horns of the altar with your finger, and all the blood you shall pour out at the base of the altar.

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ אֶת־כָּל־הַחֵלֶב הַמְכַסֶּה אֶת־הַקֶּרֶב וְאֵת הַיֹּתֶרֶת עַל־הַכָּבֵד וְאֵת שְׁתֵּי הַכְּלָיֹת וְאֶת־הַחֵלֶב אֲשֶׁר עֲלֵיהֶן וְהִקְטַרְתָּ הַמִּזְבֵּחָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take all the fat that covers the entrails, and the appendage on the liver, and the two kidneys with the fat that is on them, and offer it up in smoke on the altar.

raw: וְאֶת־בְּשַׂר הַפָּר וְאֶת־עֹרוֹ וְאֶת־פִּרְשׁוֹ תִּשְׂרֹף בָּאֵשׁ מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה חַטָּאת הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the flesh of the bull, and its hide, and its dung, you shall burn with fire outside the camp; it is a sin offering.

raw: וְאֶת־הָאַיִל הָאֶחָד תִּקָּח וְסָמְכוּ אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו אֶת־יְדֵיהֶם עַל־רֹאשׁ הָאָיִל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the one ram you shall take, and Aaron and his sons shall lay their hands on the head of the ram.

raw: וְשָׁחַטְתָּ אֶת־הָאָיִל וְלָקַחְתָּ אֶת־דָּמוֹ וְזָרַקְתָּ עַל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ סָבִיב׃

raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ אֵת הָאַיִל הַשֵּׁנִי וְסָמַךְ אַהֲרֹן וּבָנָיו אֶת־יְדֵיהֶם עַל־רֹאשׁ הָאָיִל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall slaughter the ram, and you shall take some of its blood and put it on the lobe of Aaron's right ear, and on the lobe of his sons' right ear, and on the thumb of their right hand, and on the big toe of their right foot, and you shall throw the blood against the altar all around.

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take some of the blood that is on the altar, and some of the anointing oil, and sprinkle it on Aaron and on his garments, and on his sons and on the garments of his sons with him. raw: וְלָקַחְתָּ מִן־הָאַיִל הַחֵלֶב וְהָאַלְיָה וְאֶת־הַחֵלֶב הַמְכַסֶּה אֶת־הַקֶּרֶב וְאֵת יֹתֶרֶת הַכָּבֵד וְאֵת שְׁתֵּי הַכְּלָיֹת וְאֶת־הַחֵלֶב אֲשֶׁר עֲלֵהֶן וְאֵת שׁוֹק הַיָּמִין כִּי אֵיל מִלֻּאִים הוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And you shall take from the ram the fat and the fat tail, and the fat that covers the entrails, and the appendage of the liver, and the two kidneys with the fat that is on them, and the right thigh, for it is a ram of ordination.

raw: וְכִכַּר לֶחֶם אַחַת וַחַלַּת לֶחֶם שֶׁמֶן אַחַת וְרָקִיק אֶחָד מִסַּל הַמַּצּוֹת אֲשֶׁר לִפְנֵי יְהוָה׃

יהוה (YHWH): The Tetragrammaton, the name of God.
הרעה (hara'ah): Root: רעה (R'H) - evil, bad, wickedness.  Noun.
אשר (asher): which, who, that, relative pronoun.
דבר (dibber): Root: דבר (DBR) - to speak, say. Piel (intensive active) form.
לעשות (la'asot): Root: עשה ('SH) - to do, make. Infinitive construct.
לעמו (le'ammo): Root: עם ('M) - people.  With preposition ל (to) and possessive suffix (his people).
ai_data.tone: Solemn, remorseful (divine).  Highlights the concept of divine repentance or a change of heart.

raw: וַיַּעֲשׂוּ בְנֵי־לֵוִי כִּדְבַר מֹשֶׁה וַיִּפֹּל מִן־הָעָם בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא כִּשְׁלֹשֶׁת אַלְפֵי אִישׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: So the sons of Levi did according to the word of Moses, and about three thousand men of the people fell that day.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר מֹשֶׁה מִלְאוּ יֶדְכֶם הַיּוֹם לַיהוָה כִּי אִישׁ בִּבְנוֹ וּבְאָחִיו וְלָתֵת עֲלֵיכֶם הַיּוֹם בְּרָכָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses said, "Consecrate yourselves today to the Lord, for every man is against his son and against his brother, so that He may bestow on you a blessing today."

raw: וַיְהִי מִמָּחֳרָת וַיֹּאמֶר מֹשֶׁה אֶל־הָעָם אַתֶּם חֲטָאתֶם חֲטָאָה גְדֹלָה וְעַתָּה אֶעֱלֶה אֶל־יְהוָה אוּלַי אֲכַפְּרָה בְּעַד חַטַּאתְכֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it came to pass on the morrow, that Moses said unto the people, Ye have sinned a great sin: and now I will go up unto the LORD; peradventure I shall make an atonement for your sin.

raw: וַיָּשָׁב מֹשֶׁה אֶל־יְהוָה וַיֹּאמַר אָנָּא חָטָא הָעָם הַזֶּה חֲטָאָה גְדֹלָה וַיַּעֲשׂוּ לָהֶם אֱלֹהֵי זָהָב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses returned to the LORD, and said, 'Oh, this people has committed a great sin, and has made for themselves a god of gold.'

raw: וְעַתָּה אִם־תִּשָּׂא חַטָּאתָם וְאִם־אַיִן מְחֵנִי נָא מִסִּפְרְךָ אֲשֶׁר כָּתָבְתָּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And now, if You will forgive their sin--but if not, please blot me out of Your book which You have written.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה מִי אֲשֶׁר חָטָא־לִי אֶמְחֶנּוּ מִסִּפְרִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD said to Moses, 'Whoever has sinned against Me, I will blot him out of My book.'

raw: וְעַתָּה לֵךְ נְחֵה אֶת־הָעָם אֶל אֲשֶׁר־דִּבַּרְתִּי לָךְ הִנֵּה מַלְאָכִי יֵלֵךְ לְפָנֶיךָ וּבְיוֹם פָּקְדִי וּפָקַדְתִּי עֲלֵיהֶם חַטָּאתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And now go, lead the people to the place about which I have spoken to you. Behold, my angel shall go before you. Nevertheless, in the day when I visit, I will visit their sin upon them.

raw: וַיִּגֹּף יְהוָה אֶת־הָעָם עַל אֲשֶׁר עָשׂוּ אֶת־הָעֵגֶל אֲשֶׁר עָשָׂה אַהֲרֹן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord struck the people because of what they did with the calf which Aaron made.

raw: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה לֵךְ עֲלֵה מִזֶּה אַתָּה וְהָעָם אֲשֶׁר הֶעֱלִיתָ מֵאֶרֶץ מִצְרָיִם אֶל־הָאָרֶץ אֲשֶׁר נִשְׁבַּעְתִּי לְאַבְרָהָם לְיִצְחָק וּלְיַעֲקֹב לֵאמֹר לְזַרְעֲךָ אֶתְּנֶנָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord spoke to Moses, "Go up from here, you and the people whom you brought up from the land of Egypt, to the land of which I swore to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, saying, 'To your offspring I will give it.'"

raw: וְשָׁלַחְתִּי לְפָנֶיךָ מַלְאָךְ וְגֵרַשְׁתִּי אֶת־הַכְּנַעֲנִי הָאֱמֹרִי וְהַחִתִּי וְהַפְּרִזִּי הַחִוִּי וְהַיְבוּסִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And I will send an angel before you and drive out the Canaanite, the Amorite, the Hittite, the Perizzite, the Hivite, and the Jebusite.

raw: אֶל־אֶרֶץ זָבַת חָלָב וּדְבָשׁ כִּי לֹא אֶעֱלֶה בְּקִרְבְּךָ כִּי עַם־קְשֵׁה־עֹרֶף אַתָּה פֶּן־אֲכֶלְךָ בַּדָּרֶךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: to a land flowing with milk and honey, for I will not go up in your midst, because you are a stiff-necked people, lest I consume you on the way.

raw: וַיִּשְׁמַע הָעָם אֶת־הַדָּבָר הָרָע הַזֶּה וַיִּתְאַבָּלוּ וְלֹא־שָׁתוּ אִישׁ עֶדְיוֹ עָלָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the people heard this bad thing, and they mourned, and no man put on his ornaments.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה אֱמֹר אֶל־בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אַתֶּם עַם־קְשֵׁה־עֹרֶף רֶגַע אֶחָד אֶעֱלֶה בְקִרְבְּךָ וְכִלִּיתִיךָ וְעַתָּה הוֹרֵד עֶדְיְךָ מֵעָלֶיךָ וְאֵדְעָה מָה אֶעֱשֶׂה־לָּךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD said to Moses, “Say to the children of Israel, ‘You are a stiff-necked people. If I were to go up among you for one moment, I would consume you. Now therefore, take off your ornaments, that I may know what to do with you.’”

raw: וַיִּתְנַצְּלוּ בְנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת־עֶדְיָם מֵהַר חוֹרֵב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the children of Israel stripped themselves of their ornaments, from Mount Horeb.

raw: וּמֹשֶׁה יִקַּח אֶת־הָאֹהֶל וְנָטָה־לוֹ מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה הַרְחֵק מִן־הַמַּחֲנֶה וְקָרָא לוֹ אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְהָיָה כָּל־מְבַקֵּשׁ יְהוָה יֵצֵא אֶל־אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד אֲשֶׁר מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses would take the tent and pitch it outside the camp, far from the camp, and he called it the Tent of Meeting. And it came to pass that whoever sought the Lord would go out to the Tent of Meeting which was outside the camp.

raw: וְהָיָה כְּצֵאת מֹשֶׁה אֶל־הָאֹהֶל יָקוּמוּ כָּל־הָעָם וְנִצְּבוּ אִישׁ פֶּתַח אָהֳלוֹ וְהִבִּיטוּ אַחֲרֵי מֹשֶׁה עַד־בֹּאוֹ הָאֹהֱלָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it happened, when Moses went out to the tent, all the people would rise and stand, each at the entrance of his tent, and gaze after Moses until he entered the tent.

raw: וְהָיָה כְּבֹא מֹשֶׁה הָאֹהֱלָה יֵרֵד עַמּוּד הֶעָנָן וְעָמַד פֶּתַח הָאֹהֶל וְדִבֶּר עִם־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it came to pass, when Moses entered the tent, the pillar of cloud would descend and stand at the entrance of the tent, and [God] would speak with Moses.

raw: וְרָאָה כָל־הָעָם אֶת־עַמּוּד הֶעָנָן עֹמֵד פֶּתַח הָאֹהֶל וְקָם כָּל־הָעָם וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוּוּ אִישׁ פֶּתַח אָהֳלוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the people saw the pillar of cloud standing at the entrance of the tent, and all the people rose and bowed down, each at the entrance of his tent.

raw: וְדִבֶּר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה פָּנִים אֶל־פָּנִים כַּאֲשֶׁר יְדַבֵּר אִישׁ אֶל־רֵעֵהוּ וְשָׁב אֶל־הַמַּחֲנֶה וּמְשָׁרְתוֹ יְהוֹשֻׁעַ בִּן־נוּן נַעַר לֹא יָמִישׁ מִתּוֹךְ הָאֹהֶל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD spoke to Moses face to face, as a man speaks to his friend. Then he would return to the camp, but his servant Joshua the son of Nun, a young man, would not depart from the tent.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר מֹשֶׁה אֶל־יְהוָה רְאֵה אַתָּה אֹמֵר אֵלַי הַעַל אֶת־הָעָם הַזֶּה וְאַתָּה לֹא הוֹדַעְתַּנִי אֵת אֲשֶׁר־תִּשְׁלַח עִמִּי וְאַתָּה אָמַרְתָּ יְדַעְתִּיךָ בְשֵׁם וְגַם־מָצָאתָ חֵן בְּעֵינָי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses said to the Lord, "See, You say to me, 'Bring up this people,' but You have not let me know whom You will send with me. Yet You have said, 'I know you by name, and you have also found favor in my sight.'"

raw: וְעַתָּה אִם־נָא מָצָאתִי חֵן בְּעֵינֶיךָ הוֹדִעֵנִי נָא אֶת־דְּרָכֶךָ וְאֵדָעֲךָ לְמַעַן אֶמְצָא־חֵן בְּעֵינֶיךָ וּרְאֵה כִּי עַמְּךָ הַגּוֹי הַזֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Now therefore, if I have found favor in your sight, show me now your ways, that I may know you in order that I may find favor in your sight. Consider too that this nation is your people.

raw: וַיֹּאמַר פָּנַי יֵלֵכוּ וַהֲנִחֹתִי לָךְ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And He said, 'My presence will go, and I will give you rest.'

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו אִם־אֵין פָּנֶיךָ הֹלְכִים אַל־תַּעֲלֵנוּ מִזֶּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Then he said to Him, “If Your presence does not go [with us], do not lead us up from here.”

raw: וּבַמֶּה יִוָּדַע אֵפוֹא כִּי־מָצָאתִי חֵן בְּעֵינֶיךָ אֲנִי וְעַמֶּךָ הֲלוֹא בְּלֶכְתְּךָ עִמָּנוּ וְנִפְלֵינוּ אֲנִי וְעַמְּךָ מִכָּל־הָעָם אֲשֶׁר עַל־פְּנֵי הָאֲדָמָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: For how then will it be known that I have found favor in your sight, I and your people? Is it not in your going with us, so that we are distinct, I and your people, from every people on the face of the earth?

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה גַּם אֶת־הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה אֲשֶׁר דִּבַּרְתָּ אֶעֱשֶׂה כִּי־מָצָאתָ חֵן בְּעֵינַי וָאֵדָעֲךָ בְּשֵׁם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD said to Moses, "This thing also that you have spoken I will do, for you have found favor in my sight, and I know you by name."

raw: וַיֹּאמַר הַרְאֵנִי נָא אֶת־כְּבֹדֶךָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he said, "Please show me your glory."

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר אֲנִי אַעֲבִיר כָּל־טוּבִי עַל־פָּנֶיךָ וְקָרָאתִי בְשֵׁם יְהוָה לְפָנֶיךָ וְחַנֹּתִי אֶת־אֲשֶׁר אָחֹן וְרִחַמְתִּי אֶת־אֲשֶׁר אֲרַחֵם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And He said, “I will make all My goodness pass before you, and I will proclaim the name of the LORD before you; and I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and will show compassion on whom I will show compassion.”

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר לֹא תוּכַל לִרְאֹת אֶת־פָּנָי כִּי לֹא־יִרְאַנִי הָאָדָם וָחָי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And He said, "You cannot see My face, for man shall not see Me and live."

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה הִנֵּה מָקוֹם אִתִּי וְנִצַּבְתָּ עַל־הַצּוּר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the Lord said, "Behold, there is a place by me, and you shall stand upon the rock."

raw: וְהָיָה בַּעֲבֹר כְּבֹדִי וְשַׂמְתִּיךָ בְּנִקְרַת הַצּוּר וְשַׂכֹּתִי כַפִּי עָלֶיךָ עַד־עָבְרִי׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And it shall come to pass, while my glory passes by, that I will put you in a cleft of the rock, and will cover you with my hand while I pass by.

raw: וַהֲסִרֹתִי אֶת־כַּפִּי וְרָאִיתָ אֶת־אֲחֹרָי וּפָנַי לֹא יֵרָאוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Then I will take away my hand, and you shall see my back; but my face shall not be seen.

raw: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל־מֹשֶׁה פְּסָל־לְךָ שְׁנֵי־לֻחֹת אֲבָנִים כָּרִאשֹׁנִים וְכָתַבְתִּי עַל־הַלֻּחֹת אֶת־הַדְּבָרִים אֲשֶׁר הָיוּ עַל־הַלֻּחֹת הָרִאשֹׁנִים אֲשֶׁר שִׁבַּרְתָּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD said to Moses, "Cut for yourself two tablets of stone like the first ones, and I will write on the tablets the words that were on the first tablets, which you broke."

raw: וֶהְיֵה נָכוֹן לַבֹּקֶר וְעָלִיתָ בַבֹּקֶר אֶל־הַר סִינַי וְנִצַּבְתָּ לִי שָׁם עַל־רֹאשׁ הָהָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And be ready for the morning, and come up in the morning to Mount Sinai, and present yourself to me there on the top of the mountain.

raw: וְאִישׁ לֹא־יַעֲלֶה עִמָּךְ וְגַם־אִישׁ אַל־יֵרָא בְּכָל־הָהָר גַּם־הַצֹּאן וְהַבָּקָר אַל־יִרְעוּ אֶל־מוּל הָהָר הַהוּא׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And no man shall come up with you, and no man shall be seen anywhere on the mountain. Even the flocks and herds must not graze in front of that mountain.

raw: וַיִּפְסֹל שְׁנֵי־לֻחֹת אֲבָנִים כָּרִאשֹׁנִים וַיַּשְׁכֵּם מֹשֶׁה בַבֹּקֶר וַיַּעַל אֶל־הַר סִינַי כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֹתוֹ וַיִּקַּח בְּיָדוֹ שְׁנֵי לֻחֹת אֲבָנִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he hewed two tablets of stone like the first; and Moses rose early in the morning, and went up unto mount Sinai, as the Lord had commanded him, and took in his hand two tablets of stone.

raw: וַיֵּרֶד יְהוָה בֶּעָנָן וַיִּתְיַצֵּב עִמּוֹ שָׁם וַיִּקְרָא בְשֵׁם יְהוָה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the LORD descended in the cloud, and stood with him there, and proclaimed the name of the LORD.

raw: וַיַּעֲבֹר יְהוָה עַל־פָּנָיו וַיִּקְרָא יְהוָה יְהוָה אֵל רַחוּם וְחַנּוּן אֶרֶךְ אַפַּיִם וְרַב־חֶסֶד וֶאֱמֶת

ai_data.translation_rugged: Then the Lord passed by before him and proclaimed, “The Lord, the Lord God, compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, and abounding in lovingkindness and truth;

raw: נֹצֵר חֶסֶד לָאֲלָפִים נֹשֵׂא עָוֺן וָפֶשַׁע וְחַטָּאָה וְנַקֵּה לֹא יְנַקֶּה פֹּקֵד עֲוֺן אָבוֹת עַל־בָּנִים וְעַל־בְּנֵי בָנִים עַל־שִׁלֵּשִׁים וְעַל־רִבֵּעִים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Keeping steadfast love for thousands, forgiving iniquity and transgression and sin, but who will by no means clear the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers on the children and the children's children, to the third and the fourth generation.

raw: וַיְמַהֵר מֹשֶׁה וַיִּקֹּד אַרְצָה וַיִּשְׁתָּחוּ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Moses hurried and bowed towards the earth and prostrated himself.

raw: וּבַמְּנֹרָה אַרְבָּעָה גְבִעִים מְשֻׁקָּדִים כַּפְתֹּרֶיהָ וּפְרָחֶיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And in the lampstand, four bowls made like almond blossoms, its capitals and its flowers.

raw: וְכַפְתֹּר תַּחַת שְׁנֵי הַקָּנִים מִמֶּנָּה וְכַפְתֹּר תַּחַת שְׁנֵי הַקָּנִים מִמֶּנָּה וְכַפְתֹּר תַּחַת־שְׁנֵי הַקָּנִים מִמֶּנָּה לְשֵׁשֶׁת הַקָּנִים הַיֹּצְאִים מִמֶּנָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and a knob under two branches from it, and a knob under two branches from it, and a knob under two branches from it, for the six branches going out of it.

raw: כַּפְתֹּרֵיהֶם וּקְנֹתָם מִמֶּנָּה הָיוּ כֻּלָּהּ מִקְשָׁה אַחַת זָהָב טָהוֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Their knobs and their branches were of one piece with it; the whole of it was a single hammered piece of pure gold.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־נֵרֹתֶיהָ שִׁבְעָה וּמַלְקָחֶיהָ וּמַחְתֹּתֶיהָ זָהָב טָהוֹר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made its seven lamps and its tongs and its trays of pure gold.

raw: כִּכָּר זָהָב טָהוֹר עָשָׂה אֹתָהּ וְאֵת כָּל־כֵּלֶיהָ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: He made it a talent of pure gold, and all its utensils.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־מִזְבַּח הַקְּטֹרֶת עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים אַמָּה אָרְכּוֹ וְאַמָּה רָחְבּוֹ רָבוּעַ וְאַמָּתַיִם קֹמָתוֹ מִמֶּנּוּ הָיוּ קַרְנֹתָיו׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made the altar of incense of acacia wood: a cubit was its length, and a cubit its width—it was square—and two cubits its height. Its horns were of one piece with it.

raw: וַיְצַף אֹתוֹ זָהָב טָהוֹר אֶת־גַּגּוֹ וְאֶת־קִירֹתָיו סָבִיב וְאֶת־קַרְנֹתָיו וַיַּעַשׂ לוֹ זֵר זָהָב סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he overlaid it with pure gold, its roof and its walls all around, and its horns, and he made for it a crown of gold all around.

raw: וּשְׁתֵּי טַבְּעֹת זָהָב עָשָׂה־לוֹ מִתַּחַת לְזֵרוֹ עַל שְׁתֵּי צַלְעֹתָיו עַל שְׁנֵי צִדָּיו לְבָתִּים לְבַדִּים לָשֵׂאת אֹתוֹ בָּהֶם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And two rings of gold he made for it underneath its border, on its two sides, on its two edges, as holders for poles, to carry it with them.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־הַבַּדִּים עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים וַיְצַף אֹתָם זָהָב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made the poles of acacia wood and overlaid them with gold.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־שֶׁמֶן הַמִּשְׁחָה קֹדֶשׁ וְאֶת־קְטֹרֶת הַסַּמִּים טָהוֹר מַעֲשֵׂה רֹקֵחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made the holy anointing oil, and the pure incense of spices, according to the work of a perfumer.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־מִזְבַּח הָעֹלָה עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים חָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת אָרְכּוֹ וְחָמֵשׁ־אַמּוֹת רָחְבּוֹ רָבוּעַ וְשָׁלֹשׁ אַמּוֹת קֹמָתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made the altar of burnt offering of acacia wood; five cubits was its length, and five cubits its breadth—it was square—and three cubits was its height.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ קַרְנֹתָיו עַל אַרְבַּע פִּנֹּתָיו מִמֶּנּוּ הָיוּ קַרְנֹתָיו וַיְצַף אֹתוֹ נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made its horns on its four corners; its horns were of one piece with it, and he overlaid it with bronze.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־כָּל־כְּלֵי הַמִּזְבֵּחַ אֶת־הַסִּירֹת וְאֶת־הַיָּעִים וְאֶת־הַמִּזְרָקֹת אֶת־הַמִּזְלָגֹת וְאֶת־הַמַּחְתֹּת כָּל־כֵּלָיו עָשָׂה נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made all the utensils of the altar: the pots, the shovels, the basins, the forks, and the firepans; all its utensils he made of bronze.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ לַמִּזְבֵּחַ מִכְבָּר מַעֲשֵׂה רֶשֶׁת נְחֹשֶׁת תַּחַת כַּרְכֻּבּוֹ מִלְּמַטָּה עַד־חֶצְיוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made for the altar a grating of network of copper under its ledge, from below up to its middle.

raw: וַיִּצֹק אַרְבַּע טַבָּעֹת בְּאַרְבַּע הַקְּצָוֺת לְמִכְבַּר הַנְּחֹשֶׁת בָּתִּים לַבַּדִּים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he cast four rings on the four corners of the copper grating, as holders for the poles.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־הַבַּדִּים עֲצֵי שִׁטִּים וַיְצַף אֹתָם נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made the poles of acacia wood and overlaid them with bronze.

raw: וַיָּבֵא אֶת־הַבַּדִּים בַּטַּבָּעֹת עַל צַלְעֹת הַמִּזְבֵּחַ לָשֵׂאת אֹתוֹ בָּהֶם נְבוּב לֻחֹת עָשָׂה אֹתוֹ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he brought the poles into the rings on the sides of the altar, to carry it with them; he made it hollow, of boards.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֵת הַכִּיּוֹר נְחֹשֶׁת וְאֵת כַּנּוֹ נְחֹשֶׁת בְּמַרְאֹת הַצֹּבְאֹת אֲשֶׁר צָבְאוּ פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made the basin of bronze and its stand of bronze, from the mirrors of the ministering women who ministered at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־הֶחָצֵר לִפְאַת נֶגֶב תֵּימָנָה קַלְעֵי הֶחָצֵר שֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר מֵאָה בָּאַמָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made the courtyard on the south side, facing south, with hangings of fine twisted linen, one hundred cubits long.

raw: עַמּוּדֵיהֶם עֶשְׂרִים וְאַדְנֵיהֶם עֶשְׂרִים נְחֹשֶׁת וָוֵי הָעַמֻּדִים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶם כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Their pillars were twenty, and their bases twenty, of bronze. The hooks of the pillars and their connecting bands were silver.

raw: וְלִפְאַת צָפוֹן מֵאָה בָאַמָּה עַמּוּדֵיהֶם עֶשְׂרִים וְאַדְנֵיהֶם עֶשְׂרִים נְחֹשֶׁת וָוֵי הָעַמּוּדִים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶם כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the north side, a hundred cubits; their pillars were twenty, and their sockets twenty, of bronze; the hooks of the pillars and their bands were of silver.

raw: וְלִפְאַת־יָם קְלָעִים חֲמִשִּׁים בָּאַמָּה עַמּוּדֵיהֶם עֲשָׂרָה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם עֲשָׂרָה וָוֵי הָעַמֻּדִים וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the side facing the sea, there were fifty clasps; their pillars were ten, and their bases ten; the hooks of the pillars and their connecting rods were of silver.

raw: וְלִפְאַת קֵדְמָה מִזְרָחָה חֲמִשִּׁים אַמָּה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the front, eastward, fifty cubits.

raw: קְלָעִים חֲמֵשׁ־עֶשְׂרֵה אַמָּה אֶל־הַכָּתֵף עַמּוּדֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: Hangings, fifteen cubits, to the shoulder; their pillars three, and their sockets three.

raw: וְלַכָּתֵף הַשֵּׁנִית מִזֶּה וּמִזֶּה לְשַׁעַר הֶחָצֵר קְלָעִים חֲמֵשׁ עֶשְׂרֵה אַמָּה עַמֻּדֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם שְׁלֹשָׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And for the second side, likewise, at the gate of the courtyard, hangings of fifteen cubits, their pillars three, and their sockets three.

raw: כָּל־קַלְעֵי הֶחָצֵר סָבִיב שֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the hangings of the court round about were of fine twined linen.

raw: וְהָאֲדָנִים לָעַמֻּדִים נְחֹשֶׁת וָוֵי הָעַמּוּדִים וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם כֶּסֶף וְצִפּוּי רָאשֵׁיהֶם כָּסֶף וְהֵם מְחֻשָּׁקִים כֶּסֶף כֹּל עַמֻּדֵי הֶחָצֵר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the sockets for the pillars were bronze, the hooks of the pillars and their bands were silver, and the overlaying of their tops was silver, and they were banded with silver, all the pillars of the court.

raw: וּמָסַךְ שַׁעַר הֶחָצֵר מַעֲשֵׂה רֹקֵם תְּכֵלֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן וְתוֹלַעַת שָׁנִי וְשֵׁשׁ מָשְׁזָר וְעֶשְׂרִים אַמָּה אֹרֶךְ וְקוֹמָה בְרֹחַב חָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת לְעֻמַּת קַלְעֵי הֶחָצֵר׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made a screen for the gate of the court, embroidered with blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and fine twisted linen. It was twenty cubits long and five cubits high, corresponding to the hangings of the court.

raw: וְעַמֻּדֵיהֶם אַרְבָּעָה וְאַדְנֵיהֶם אַרְבָּעָה נְחֹשֶׁת וָוֵיהֶם כֶּסֶף וְצִפּוּי רָאשֵׁיהֶם וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶם כָּסֶף׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And their pillars were four, and their sockets were four, of bronze; their hooks were of silver, and the overlaying of their tops and their fillets were of silver.

raw: וְכָל־הַיְתֵדֹת לַמִּשְׁכָּן וְלֶחָצֵר סָבִיב נְחֹשֶׁת׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And all the pegs of the tabernacle and of the courtyard round about were bronze.

raw: אֵלֶּה פְקוּדֵי הַמִּשְׁכָּן מִשְׁכַּן הָעֵדֻת אֲשֶׁר פֻּקַּד עַל־פִּי מֹשֶׁה עֲבֹדַת הַלְוִיִּם בְּיַד אִיתָמָר בֶּן־אַהֲרֹן הַכֹּהֵן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: These are the records of the tabernacle, the tabernacle of the testimony, which were recorded at the command of Moses, for the service of the Levites, under the direction of Ithamar son of Aaron the priest.

raw: וּבְצַלְאֵל בֶּן־אוּרִי בֶן־חוּר לְמַטֵּה יְהוּדָה עָשָׂה אֵת כָּל־אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּה יְהוָה אֶת־מֹשֶׁה׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And Bezalel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah, made all that the LORD commanded Moses.

raw: וְאִתּוֹ אָהֳלִיאָב בֶּן־אֲחִיסָמָךְ לְמַטֵּה־דָן חָרָשׁ וְחֹשֵׁב וְרֹקֵם בַּתְּכֵלֶת וּבָאַרְגָּמָן וּבְתוֹלַעַת הַשָּׁנִי וּבַשֵּׁשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And with him was Oholiab, son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan, an engraver and designer and embroiderer in blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and fine linen.

raw: כָּל־הַזָּהָב הֶעָשׂוּי לַמְּלָאכָה בְּכֹל מְלֶאכֶת הַקֹּדֶשׁ וַיְהִי זְהַב הַתְּנוּפָה תֵּשַׁע וְעֶשְׂרִים כִּכָּר וּשְׁבַע מֵאוֹת וּשְׁלֹשִׁים שֶׁקֶל בְּשֶׁקֶל הַקֹּדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: All the gold that was used for the work in all the work of the sanctuary, even the gold of the wave offering, was twenty-nine talents and seven hundred and thirty shekels, according to the shekel of the sanctuary.

raw: וְכֶסֶף פְּקוּדֵי הָעֵדָה מְאַת כִּכָּר וְאֶלֶף וּשְׁבַע מֵאוֹת וַחֲמִשָּׁה וְשִׁבְעִים שֶׁקֶל בְּשֶׁקֶל הַקֹּדֶשׁ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the silver from those counted of the congregation was one hundred talents and one thousand seven hundred and seventy-five shekels, according to the sanctuary shekel.

raw: בֶּקַע לַגֻּלְגֹּלֶת מַחֲצִית הַשֶּׁקֶל בְּשֶׁקֶל הַקֹּדֶשׁ לְכֹל הָעֹבֵר עַל־הַפְּקֻדִים מִבֶּן עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנָה וָמַעְלָה לְשֵׁשׁ־מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף וּשְׁלֹשֶׁת אֲלָפִים וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת וַחֲמִשִּׁים׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: A bekah per head, half a shekel according to the sanctuary shekel, for everyone who passes over those numbered, from twenty years old and upward, for six hundred and three thousand five hundred and fifty.

raw: וַיְהִי מְאַת כִּכַּר הַכֶּסֶף לָצֶקֶת אֵת אַדְנֵי הַקֹּדֶשׁ וְאֵת אַדְנֵי הַפָּרֹכֶת מְאַת אֲדָנִים לִמְאַת הַכִּכָּר כִּכָּר לָאָדֶן׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the hundred talents of silver were for casting the sockets of the sanctuary and the sockets of the curtain; a hundred sockets for the hundred talents, a talent for a socket.

raw: וְאֶת־הָאֶלֶף וּשְׁבַע הַמֵּאוֹת וַחֲמִשָּׁה וְשִׁבְעִים עָשָׂה וָוִים לָעַמּוּדִים וְצִפָּה רָאשֵׁיהֶם וְחִשַּׁק אֹתָם׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the 1775 (shekels of silver) he made hooks for the pillars, and overlaid their tops, and joined them.

raw: וּנְחֹשֶׁת הַתְּנוּפָה שִׁבְעִים כִּכָּר וְאַלְפַּיִם וְאַרְבַּע־מֵאוֹת שָׁקֶל׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And the copper of the wave offering was seventy talents and two thousand four hundred shekels.

raw: וַיַּעַשׂ בָּהּ אֶת־אַדְנֵי פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד וְאֵת מִזְבַּח הַנְּחֹשֶׁת וְאֶת־מִכְבַּר הַנְּחֹשֶׁת אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ וְאֵת כָּל־כְּלֵי הַמִּזְבֵּחַ׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: And he made for it the sockets for the entrance of the tent of meeting, the bronze altar, the bronze grating for it, and all the utensils of the altar.

raw: וְאֶת־אַדְנֵי הֶחָצֵר סָבִיב וְאֶת־אַדְנֵי שַׁעַר הֶחָצֵר וְאֵת כָּל־יִתְדֹת הַמִּשְׁכָּן וְאֶת־כָּל־יִתְדֹת הֶחָצֵר סָבִיב׃

ai_data.translation_rugged: and the sockets of the courtyard round about, and the sockets of the gate of the courtyard, and all the pegs of the tabernacle, and all the pegs of the courtyard round about.
